data.title: The Recording Industry Association of Japan Releases Its Download & Streaming Certifications for March
data.meta_description: This month on the download side, two songs from 2021 were certified Gold for selling 100,000 downloads: Utada Hikaru's "One Last Kiss" and YOASOBI's "Kaibutsu."
data.text:
This month on the download side, two songs from 2021 were certified Gold for selling 100,000 downloads: Utada Hikaru‘s “One Last Kiss” and YOASOBI‘s “Kaibutsu.”

One song was certified Million for selling 1,000,000 copies: LiSA‘s “Homura.”

On the streaming side, three songs from 2021 were certified Gold for reaching 50,000,000 streams: Awesome City Club‘s “Wasurena” and YOASOBI’s “Encore” & “Kaibutsu.”

Download

Million (1,000,000):

LiSA – Homura (10/12/20)

Double Platinum (500,000):

Uru – Prologue (10/30/18)

Suda Masaki – Sayonara Elegy (1/7/18)

Gold (100,000):

Ado – Usseewa (10/23/20)

Utada Hikaru – One Last Kiss (3/9/21)

YOASOBI – Kaibutsu (1/6/21)

Ryokuoushoku Shakai – Mela! (4/13/20)
